title: Identify font called Sign Painter
content:
I have been using a font called Sign Painter by Compuworks on my mac. Now we need to use it on a PC and my TrueType font will not work on the PC. I need to know where I can get a PC version of this font or one that looks like it that will work on a PC.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127113800im_/http:/typophile.com/files/signpainter_4679.jpg)
author: Susiequs

comments.content:
House Industry has nice onces:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127113800/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts")

Pieter

Sen me the file and I can convert it to a pc font with TypeTool.  
 [rtrogman@dc.rr.com](mailto:rtrogman@dc.rr.com)
